website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to the latest in the Galaxy S series, this is the case to get to safeguard your investment. It's durable, slim, and built to protect.
pros: A top design by a trusted name in cell phone cases
Sleek construction, two layers of shock-absorbing materials, and convenient port covers
cons: May fail to protect the screen from harsh treatment or drops, but stands up to most types of abuse

customer_reviews.title: Sleek protection with muted style
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. The color is deep Aqua blue, much nicer than the typically navy options you see for most phones. The two pieces fit together snugly, making the phone feel very safe. The textured plastic provides a nice grip. Most importantly, the case doesn't feel bulky, but still provides ample protection. I've dropped my phone onto concrete twice and there's not even a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? Its an OtterBox!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my S8 in Italy (lots of Stone Steps and Walkways among the Ruins) and SURE ENOUGH I DROPPED IT 6 TIMES HOPPING UP AND DOWN THE STEPS of the Roman Coliseum. I owned plenty of phones but OtterBox has always protected them the best. They don't flex, they are resilient enough to not shock the phone, and they are easy to clean. What else do you want? Simply the best (and reasonably priced).
customer_reviews.author: lilringers

customer_reviews.title: I like this protective case very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this protective case very much. I ordered it in blue, and is pretty close the the color of the back of my phone. It does look a bit rough, compared to the sleek looks of the phone itself, but it is designed well to protect the 'precious' phone. I was able to fit a protective glass shield from ArmorSuit under this case very nicely. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diver Dan

customer_reviews.title: My OtterBox rules!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my OtterBox for over a year and had the occasional minor drops with no problems. But today was the real test. I was riding my bike 15-20mph and hit a big bump and my S8 bounced out of my (ooops) unzipped bike bag and tumbled head over heals 20 feet down the concrete street before finally stopping in the gutter! I picked it up fully expecting the worst and other than a couple marked corners on the OtterBox my phone is still like new! I expect maybe I got lucky but there is zero chance that phone would be running without the protection! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good case, just a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: This case seems well-made, protects my S8 well, and doesn't add too much to the size of the phone so it still easily slips into a pocket. My two biggest complaints are the price, and the annoying little flap that's meant to seal water out of the charging connector. I understand its purpose and why it is the way it is. But I'm not really in the habit of dropping my phone in the bathtub so I might cut the flap off which would solve the problem 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Law

customer_reviews.title: Case uses rubber as the first shell around the phone then a plastic shell.
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox COMMUTER SERIES for Samsung Galaxy S8 case for the Galaxy 8 is by far the best case I have used. The previous cases I had, OtterBox 77-54521 Defender Series for Samsung Galaxy S8, utilized a plastic clip to hold the phone in the case with the protective rubber around it. After purchasing two of those due to the clips breaking, I tried the OtterBox COMMUTER SERIES for Samsung Galaxy S8. It encases the phone in a protective rubber and then a plastic shell. No thin parts to break. It also thinner than any other case I have had for the Galaxy. Great Design.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good case
customer_reviews.text: It's a real nice case. My previous cases would just fall apart so I wanted a name brand case and this one is certainly more sturdy. First day I got it I accidentally dropped it twice and it did it's job. Only downside is a weakness of some phone cases and that's the rubber material stick to the inside of your pants pockets which inevitably turn inside-out when you pull the phone out of your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: Commuter is fine, so far.
customer_reviews.text: Had a defender box on my last phone and it did a great job, no breakage with the defender. But wanted to go a bit less bulky this time. So far commuter has been a good choice. The Otter boxes are a bit pricer. Really the only tweak I would recommend would be to make the commuter case less slick, more like the defender in feel. The slickness of the commuter makes it harder to hold.
customer_reviews.author: lovemylibrary

customer_reviews.title: Didn't protect my phone well.
customer_reviews.text: Due to the rounded edges of the Samsung Galaxy S8, this case does not protect your phone. My screen cover is fine--but when I've dropped my phone, the edges are where it is vulnerable. Having to buy a new phone now, as the edge crack created a line right through the middle of the screen, causing the bottom-half to stop showing, just bright LED light. I would suggest a different case for this unique phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nolsirk

customer_reviews.title: Sleek otter
customer_reviews.text: Nice slim case. Has good protection while not making the phone seem too much bigger than its "naked" dimensions. Fots really well in my front pocket and haven't had any issues so far with it. The little dust covers for the charger and aux port took a little bit of finagling to get to sit right but it's really not an issue just realize when you put the case on your phone you might want to pop those through their cut outside first.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good case, great price, but hampers using the phone, as a phone.
customer_reviews.text: It fits the phone well, great price, and seems to protect. I'm thrilled this case will actually allow me to double press the power button to bring up the camera. BUT, people seem to have a hard time understanding me during phone conversations, especially so while using the speakerphone. :( When I remove the case or use the headset, they hear me fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this case...
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved otterman products, but this is not their usual quality. The holes are mis-lined and you really have to remove the case to charge it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hodge

customer_reviews.title: I trust Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my first Samsung phone years ago, I started out using an Otterbox. My phone has been dropped in every way imaginable dozens and dozens of times. So far, nothing has ever cracked. I will be an Otterbox fan forever.
customer_reviews.author: drynard

customer_reviews.title: Greatly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Greatly disappointed. Look great fits great but it stops there. Offers little protection to your phone. Phone feel out of my front pocket on my hoody to ground and my screen cracked. This is the phone case main job protecting the screen. Complete and utter failure. Would not buy Ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these I ordered. I ordered one in purple and now blue. They really seem to protect my phone well. I have dropped it a couple of times but the edge sticks out all around and keeps my glass from hitting the ground. Wouldn't buy anything else. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Easy to fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great design that protects but doesn't add too much bulk to the phone. Be careful if you take the phone in and out a lot as the rubber part can year, which is why I had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps phone safe. All but Disappears in Pocket
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to install. I have had it for several months now and have given it hard daily use including international travel. I have dropped my phone several times with no damage whatsoever. If you're vacillating on which case to buy, I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Thudder

customer_reviews.title: The 2 peice design goes on/off easily and offers great protection to sides/corners.
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Otterbox products and this one didn't let me down. I like the look and feel, and the wireless charging works fine while encased. I also like the protection given to the beveled edge of the screen. I recomend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Don A.

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Reliable protection
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!! I have been using this case over a year now and through all of the normal daily life slips trips and falls it has protected my phone amazingly! Absolutly love it and overall recomend otterbox for protecting your phone. They do it right!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Protects my phone like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove on my samsung note 8 . I have butter fingers so keeping my phone in my hand is a challenge. This case has protected my phone through at least twenty drops. Great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Only one small but irritating problem
customer_reviews.text: Durable and attractive. Does as it should. One drawback are the "hatches" for earbuds and charger cable. Won't stay open while I'm trying to insert the jacks.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: protects like it says it will
customer_reviews.text: protects like it says it will. Very Happy. This is my 3rd commuter series (changing phone styles means I needed a new one) and intend to keep using this series with all new phones I get.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Protection not good  on the side of the phon
customer_reviews.text: My S8 has a raised glass. With this Otterbox the ends are protected but the glass stands up higher on the side than the case. I dropped my new phone and the side is all schattered. The case is very durable ...just doesn't offer enough protection.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, Does the job, and having smooth plastic over rubber insert makes it slip into pocket easily. Have not had an incident yet so don't know if it will save phone or screen during a drop. Only wish is that sides had slightly higher raised area to better protect screen when placed face down on surface.
customer_reviews.author: parateer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped my new phone so many times that I'm really kind of annoyed with myself, but this case has done it's job, no damage to the phone! Had a very similar OtterBox case on my last phone and it kept it safe for around 4 years, so I think I'll stick with their stuff.
customer_reviews.author: GBD

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have dropped my phone several times & it has endured no damage. I bought this case to replace another otter box case I had. This one is different, but durable. (My other was just fine too, wanted a case/color change)
customer_reviews.author: rebekah halsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Perfect fit. Great case. I've dropped my phone a few times and this case has kept it protected
customer_reviews.author: 220 Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox A+
customer_reviews.text: It's an Otterbox. You're getting exactly what it says; protection and style. Feels good in the hand and protects from those accidental drops and some spills even. I've had this on my Samsung Galaxy S8 for 4 months. It's saved my device from a toddling terror more times than I can count. Color holds up and doesn't noticeably fade. Has flaps that protect the device's charging port and headphone jack. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Paramedic292

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes it
customer_reviews.text: Can't be too sure about the durability. This is my second one; my husband however, wanted this exact one again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Mattio

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I wish the case was a little taller in the screen side to protect the screen some...but due to the shape of the screen (rounding over the edge) I guess it wouldn't work anyway. Good case, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this OtterBox
customer_reviews.text: I have had different cases throughout my cell phone life and none of them fit me. I ended up not buying anymore cases and going through 3 phones (breaking them) without a case. When I purchased this case, I was super happy with it. I ended up buying my fiance the same one and he loves it too. Highly recommend this OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: Natosha Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it’s rubbery, which gives great protection to the phone itself. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: The way it feels. Doesn't slide out of my pocket
customer_reviews.text: Easy grip. Smaller than what I'm used to. Took some getting used to but now I lovd it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It's got 2 flaps that cover the plug in & speaker holes won't work unless I cut them off. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size shown
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as a different size. Had to return. Looking for Note 8 size.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F. Occhiuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to pop off of my phone. The two that I've had previously did not. Otherwise its what i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone case!
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone case after much thought. I have dropped my (already cracked) phone and not a single new knick has appeared!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this case
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox does it again. Absolutely love this case. Definitely a great case for the s8. Buttons are easily pressed and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: colegnd

customer_reviews.title: Phone's Features Aren't Working Correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Commuter Series Otter Box, along with my Alpha Glass for my Samsung Galaxy S8. For some reason, my phone's keys aren't operating with the cover on, but it's working with just the Alpha Glass itself. Repositioning didn't seem to be need but I did it anyway, which hasn't helped.
customer_reviews.author: Eldona

customer_reviews.title: advertised perfectly
customer_reviews.text: been using 8 months.. still perfect and so is my phone
customer_reviews.author: Keith P.

customer_reviews.title: Screen cracked after only 2 days with case
customer_reviews.text: Not even 2 days with having the case on it slipped out of my hands and the left side of my screen cracked even with a screen protector. It's a hit or miss, but the case only prevented the cracking ever so slightly. Besides that, it did nothing to protect my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H. Orzehoski

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice case!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install however it did roll up the edges of my Zagg screen protector, so I discarded it. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Gunru

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case, perfect fit. To my Samsung Galaxy S8. Work perfectly with my inductive charger.
customer_reviews.author: PRL

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped my phone a few times and my screen hasn't cracked. I also bought a screen protector and the case doesn't seem to interfere.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterio

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the texture combined with edge makes it very secure in my hands. The covers over the ports is a great idea. The curved screen protector fits perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Walter S.

customer_reviews.title: Very protective. Also very slick, so it slides off of alot of surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This case 100% works. I know this really well because it slides out of my hand and off of everything I set it on. Not sure why they would design it that. The last case I bought from otterbox was just as protective except it was very grippy.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosC

customer_reviews.title: Lifelong customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my last phone, loved it so much I bought it for my new phone. OtterBox is a great company, and their cases are top notch. When I returned my old phone, there was no damage at all where the case was, even after 2 years and rough handling. You definitely want to get a screen protector as well, I got it OTAO X-Lambo.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Maki

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: Love all otterbox products! Fits my S-8 perfect. I'm sure it will protect from future drops.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Covers the phone well and is thick enough to provide good insular protection. Only flaw is the spot on the phone where it is charged. Small rubbery piece on the case is a little hard to open so you can insert the charger. Otherwise, I like the color and feel it is good protection for my new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, not too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Most otterbox cases I feel are too bulky for normal use. This case is less bulky. I love the color of blue as well. I've dropped my phone many times with this case, and it has served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki S

customer_reviews.title: Always choose OtterBox
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for another OtterBox commuter case that cracked after several drops, besides screen damage due to not having a screen protector this case always keeps my phone safe. It's not worth it to skimp on cheap off brand cases
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Save my phone
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully no more cracked screens! Seems perfect works great so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't love the color but excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: The color is a lot brighter/more blue than pictured, basically just blue. It's a very effective case, buying to replace a similar one that just got worn out and cracked after over a year.
customer_reviews.author: yesIhavenobananas

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Easy to hold. Color is nicer than pic but very close.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K. Lahey

customer_reviews.title: What every phone needs
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my new phone immediately after putting the otterbox on, all is well
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this a while back and still in good shape my husband like the color
customer_reviews.author: Dayra

customer_reviews.title: Keeps phone super safe
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped my phone so much in this case and it has been fine everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Britain Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Case fits our phone perfectly. It offers great protection as well. My daughter loves the color.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Really nice...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for awhile and it really keeps my phone safe from falls, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: F150 ranger guy

customer_reviews.title: Not in the shape I expected
customer_reviews.text: There is wear and tear all around the lenses. A downgrade from the phone I had, which was stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi C

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: You just can't go wrong with an OtterBox. Good color and rugged without the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rene

customer_reviews.title: Other than that case so far is very good.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have found it that you need to remove the case to "wireless" charge the phone and to use the USB to S-type connector. Other than that case so far is very good.
customer_reviews.author: F. Messer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Galaxy 8
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, fast shipping, but did not fit the Samsung Galaxy 8. Too small. No problems with the return.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: Good but take into account this doesnt come with the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Enrique Furlan Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Best case I've had to date. 3 month update. still protects everything just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great case! Recommend!😁
customer_reviews.text: Really like the case. Kept my phone from any damages I could cause from day to day stupidities!
customer_reviews.author: Raja Datta

customer_reviews.title: Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: Great phone protection at a reasonable cost. The blue color is also appealing.
customer_reviews.author: B & N

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck if on sale
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting case works with tempered glass screen I have noticed the case is a little slick but noting crazy (don't bring your phone out with you if at bar or normal times you would drop your phone because again it is slick)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not really as robust looking and feeling as I would ...
customer_reviews.text: not really as robust looking and feeling as I would expect from this brand. Prob would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: A product I can trust
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox has never let me down. Their products are always solid, trustworthy, and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light weight case that provides good protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light weight case that provides good protection. Pair this with a screen protector and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Toddler proofing my phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the case. It doesnt add too much weight or structure to my phone
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kessler

customer_reviews.title: its ok for what it is
customer_reviews.text: took some time to get used to the texture but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: W. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: solid product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my phone safe and secure from droppage! easy to take off as well if needed like for a VR headset. very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe outer box makes this cheap bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: BURNETT

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Order came fast. Dropped phone several times and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bain

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox is awesome protection
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with OtterBox. May make your phone a little bulky, but your phone is protected & safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bladimir A. Angeli

customer_reviews.title: Fits And Protects Superbly
customer_reviews.text: Fits and protects my phone exceptionally well. The phone & Case still fits comfortably in my holster.
customer_reviews.author: Tedd A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, will get the job done and easy on the budget
customer_reviews.author: Doug T.

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox Will Fulfill Your Expectations
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox has supplied excellent cell phone cases for many, many family members.
customer_reviews.author: InkBlots

customer_reviews.title: Nice and slim
customer_reviews.text: First case cracked along the bottom bit overall a very comfortable S8 solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it. Great quality and Otter box you really can't go wrong. Solid name brand. Worth the buy! My husband's not doing cart wheels but he's happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Protecting my phone  and being able to hold onto it
customer_reviews.text: Saved my phone from getting broke or cracked when dropped a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Hollis-Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you like broken screens
customer_reviews.text: Useless for the s8, offers 0 protection against screen down falls. Just broke mine for the 2nd time off a fall that wasn't even bad.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Case crack and this morning when I took of the case the entire back of my phone is cracked up. Never again 😭😭
customer_reviews.author: Tweet

customer_reviews.title: Great case and great protection.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great case. Doesn't protect the screen as much as I'd like but protects better than the Symmetry style.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is better than the last one and protects better
customer_reviews.author: D M H

customer_reviews.title: Good, except for use with wireless chargers
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is that the case doesn't work well with wireless chargers.
customer_reviews.author: CHARO

customer_reviews.title: I like the size
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, but the case is slicker than the phone itself. Very easily slips out of hands and tough to grip which makes it almost as dangerous as simply not having a case
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs better screen protection.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, several drops and no dents yet. Would appreciate a little more protection for the screen, currently as bare minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Shire

customer_reviews.title: Its a OtterBox the best brand there is
customer_reviews.text: What can you say: Its a OtterBox the best brand there is.
customer_reviews.author: William D Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit with just the right thickness
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I like that it covers the USB C Charge port to keep out the dust bunnies.
customer_reviews.author: sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Way too smooth, very slippery. Have had other OtterBox cases and liked them, this is far too slippery to hold comfortably. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Great! Wrong style though
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what u wabted!!! Perfect condition. Only side note is that this is actually the commuter case NOT the symmetry case
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not my color
customer_reviews.text: The color was a bit brighter than what you see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I was worried about it making my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I was worried about it making my phone too "thick", but phone still feels slim. Fits like a glove. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: looks really nice, but it did break upon impact and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Protected my phone, looks really nice, but it did break upon impact and a piece cracked off.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Durability and strength of the case
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product, I've dropped my phone a few times, I thought it'll be broken. But this case is so amazing, I'm happy with the product and durability of this case.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY disappointed that I spent $15, ordered a case as a Christmas present for my boyfriend, what was shipped to me was IPHONE X screen protectors and HALF of the plastic lining to a case that wasn’t even for the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby O.

customer_reviews.title: Love my otter box
customer_reviews.text: Love my otter box!! One of the best cases one can own. Sleek and not bulky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Otterbox Commuter Series for Samsung Galaxy s8 - Frustration Free Packaging - Bespoke Way (Blazer Blue/Stormy Seas Blue)
product_meta.description: You Do Not Have Time to Precision Pack Your Briefcase. So Pack Along Commuter Series for Samsung Galaxy s8 — the Slim, Sleek Case That Fits Into Any Pocket, Purse or Bag. Featuring Two Tough Layers — an Internal Slipcover and Exterior Shell — Commuter Series Keeps Your Smartphone Safe From Drops, Bumps, Dust and Life on the Go. Materials: Synthetic Rubber Slipcover, Polycarbonate Shell.
feature_bullets: Thin, lightweight 2-piece case provides protection against drops bumps and shock (port covers block entry of dust and debris).
Slides easily in and out of pockets.
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars882 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
